<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_933235_gvs_sport_contribution</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>GVS_SPORT Calculate Status (Delete)</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

  //calculates "Current status" when a new contribution record is deleted
    var sum = 0;
    var challengeGR = previous.challenge.getRefRecord();
    var contributionGR = new GlideRecord('x_933235_gvs_sport_contribution');
    contributionGR.addQuery('challenge', challengeGR.getUniqueValue());
    contributionGR.query();

    while (contributionGR.next()) {
        //iterates through related contributions and sums their values
		sum = sum + parseInt(contributionGR.getValue('contribution'), 10);
    }

    challengeGR.setValue('current_status', sum);
    challengeGR.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_gv_dluo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-16 13:44:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a8d37d849717111010c67b771153affb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GVS_SPORT Calculate Status (Delete)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="[GVS] Sport Challenge" source="x_933235_gvs_sport">6f13f8ed97c3111010c67b771153afd9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="[GVS] Sport Challenge">6f13f8ed97c3111010c67b771153afd9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a8d37d849717111010c67b771153affb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_gv_dluo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-18 13:39:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a8d37d849717111010c67b771153affb"/></record_update>
